程序包 net.minecraftforge.fluids

类 FluidTank

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidTank
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IFluidHandler, IFluidTank
    public class FluidTank
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFluidTank, IFluidHandler
    Reference implementation of IFluidTank. Use/extend this or implement your own.

      FluidStack drainInternal​(int maxDrain, boolean doDrain)
      Use this method to bypass the restrictions from canDrainFluidType(FluidStack) Meant for use by the owner of the tank when they have canDrain() set to false}.

        @Nullable
public FluidStack getFluid()
        指定者:
        getFluid 在接口中 IFluidTank
        返回:
        FluidStack representing the fluid in the tank, null if the tank is empty.

      • getInfo

        public FluidTankInfo getInfo()
        从接口复制的说明: IFluidTank
        Returns a wrapper object FluidTankInfo containing the capacity of the tank and the FluidStack it holds. Should prevent manipulation of the IFluidTank. See FluidTank.
        指定者:
        getInfo 在接口中 IFluidTank
        返回:
        State information for the IFluidTank.

      • getTankProperties

        public IFluidTankProperties[] getTankProperties()
        从接口复制的说明: IFluidHandler
        Returns an array of objects which represent the internal tanks. These objects cannot be used to manipulate the internal tanks.
        指定者:
        getTankProperties 在接口中 IFluidHandler
        返回:
        Properties for the relevant internal tanks.

      • fill

        public int fill​(FluidStack resource,
                boolean doFill)
        从接口复制的说明: IFluidHandler
        Fills fluid into internal tanks, distribution is left entirely to the IFluidHandler.
        指定者:
        fill 在接口中 IFluidHandler
        指定者:
        fill 在接口中 IFluidTank
        参数:
        resource - FluidStack attempting to fill the tank.
        doFill - If false, the fill will only be simulated.
        返回:
        Amount of fluid that was accepted by the tank.

      • fillInternal

        public int fillInternal​(FluidStack resource,
                        boolean doFill)
        Use this method to bypass the restrictions from canFillFluidType(FluidStack) Meant for use by the owner of the tank when they have set to false.

      • drain

        public FluidStack drain​(FluidStack resource,
                        boolean doDrain)
        从接口复制的说明: IFluidHandler
        Drains fluid out of internal tanks, distribution is left entirely to the IFluidHandler.
        指定者:
        drain 在接口中 IFluidHandler
        参数:
        resource - FluidStack representing the Fluid and maximum amount of fluid to be drained.
        doDrain - If false, drain will only be simulated.
        返回:
        FluidStack representing the Fluid and amount that was (or would have been, if simulated) drained.

      • drain

        public FluidStack drain​(int maxDrain,
                        boolean doDrain)
        从接口复制的说明: IFluidHandler
        Drains fluid out of internal tanks, distribution is left entirely to the IFluidHandler.

        This method is not Fluid-sensitive.

        指定者:
        drain 在接口中 IFluidHandler
        指定者:
        drain 在接口中 IFluidTank
        参数:
        maxDrain - Maximum amount of fluid to be removed from the container.
        doDrain - If false, the drain will only be simulated.
        返回:
        Amount of fluid that was removed from the tank.

      • drainInternal

        @Nullable
public FluidStack drainInternal​(FluidStack resource,
                                boolean doDrain)
        Use this method to bypass the restrictions from canDrainFluidType(FluidStack) Meant for use by the owner of the tank when they have canDrain() set to false}.

      • drainInternal

        @Nullable
public FluidStack drainInternal​(int maxDrain,
                                boolean doDrain)
        Use this method to bypass the restrictions from canDrainFluidType(FluidStack) Meant for use by the owner of the tank when they have canDrain() set to false}.

        Set whether this tank can be drained with IFluidHandler
        另请参阅:
        IFluidTankProperties.canDrain()

      • canFillFluidType

        public boolean canFillFluidType​(FluidStack fluid)
        Returns true if the tank can be filled with this type of fluid. Used as a filter for fluid types. Does not consider the current contents or capacity of the tank, only whether it could ever fill with this type of fluid.
        另请参阅:
        IFluidTankProperties.canFillFluidType(FluidStack)

      • canDrainFluidType

        public boolean canDrainFluidType​(@Nullable
                                 FluidStack fluid)
        Returns true if the tank can drain out this type of fluid. Used as a filter for fluid types. Does not consider the current contents or capacity of the tank, only whether it could ever drain out this type of fluid.
        另请参阅:
        IFluidTankProperties.canDrainFluidType(FluidStack)
